noPermission.description_embed: You do not have permission to use this command!

disabledFeatures.description_embed: You have successfully disabled the **{0}** feature.

enabledFeatures.description_embed: You have successfully enabled the **{0}** feature.

initCommand.description_already_embed:
This server has already been initialized. Further initialization is not possible. Use **/config** to modify its configuration. 

- The error can also occur if the TimeZone is not set correctly: use the symbol + or - starting from a UTC time to define your TimeZone, for example: +1.
initCommand.description_embed: You have successfully initialized Alka Hub. Now you can fully enjoy all the features of Alka Hub!

helpCommand.noModuleSelectEmbed:
[->] Not sure how to use Alka Hub?
Visit our documentation at https://docs.alkanetwork.eu/
[->] If you need assistance, contact support on our official Discord at https://discord.gg/X7KPcynxfB
[->] Select a module from the parameters of the /help command to explore its contents.
helpCommand.description_embed:
Here is an explanation of the required module!

[!] HASH variables can be used in the **Admin Ranks** module.
helpCommand.footer: We recommend reading **our documentation** for any doubts, you can find it in our [Official Discord](https://discord.gg/X7KPcynxfB) -> alka-docs; for any issues, you can open a report -> Technical Support.
helpCommand.general_commands:
- **/help** *[NO HASH]* - This command displays the complete list of available commands.
- **/init** *[NO HASH]* - This command initializes server configurations and language to use from those available.
- **/features** *[features]* - This command enables or disables available features in Alka Hub.
helpCommand.logs_commands: - **/logschannel** *[logschannel]* - This command sets various logs channels to send events from the Logs System.
helpCommand.permissions_commands:
- **/permission** *[NO HASH]* - This command sets permissions for roles for features and commands, these permissions are set via HASH.
- **/permissionlist** *[permissionlist]* - This command displays various permissions set based on the role.
helpCommand.ticket_commands:
- **/ticket** *[ticket]* - This command initiates configuration through a specifically created channel of the ticket system, follow the instructions.
- **/ticketcomponents** *[ticket]* - This command sets components (buttons) in the ticket message set via /ticket
helpCommand.autovoice_commands: - **/autovoice** *[autovoice]* - This command initiates configuration through a specifically created channel of the auto voice system, follow the instructions.
helpCommand.autorole_commands:
- **/autorole** *[role]* - This command sets or removes the selected role in the list of auto roles to be assigned
- **/autorolelist** - This command shows the list of auto roles currently set in the server.
helpCommand.reactionrole_commands:
- **/reactionrole** *[reactionrole]* - This command sets the roles to be assigned in reaction roles via messages.
- **/reactionrolelist** *[reactionrole]* - This command displays the list of reaction roles currently set in the server.
- **/reactionroleremove** *[reactionrole]* - This command removes the reaction roles set via messages.
helpCommand.statistics_commands:
- **/statistics** *[statsServer]* - The command allows you to create the category for the statistics system.
- **/channelstats** *[statsServer]* - The command allows the creation of channels intended for the statistics system.
- **/markdownstats** *[statsServer]* - The command displays a brief documentation of available markdowns for different channel types.
- **/channelstatsedit** *[statsServer]* - The command allows you to update the channel name to add emoji and markdown.
helpCommand.twitch_commands:
- **/twitchnotify** *[twitchNotify]* - The command allows you to add or remove a channel where notifications are sent when a streamer goes live.
- **/twitchlist** *[twitchNotify]* - The command allows the list of channels where streamer notifications are heard to be displayed.
helpCommand.youtube_commands:
- **/youtubenotify** *[youtubeNotify]* - This command allows you to add or remove a channel where notifications are sent when a video is published or goes live.
- **/youtubelist** *[youtubeNotify]* - This command allows you to view the list of channels where notifications for YouTubers are listened to.
helpCommand.musicbot_commands:
- **/play** *[NO HASH]* - This command allows you to add a song/playlist to the queue and play it in the voice channel.
- **/next** *[musicNextSkip]* - This command initiates a vote to skip to the next song in the queue.
- **/stop** *[musicStopSkip]* - This command initiates a vote to stop the queue and disconnect the Music Bot.
helpCommand.giveaway_commands:
- **/giveaway** *[giveaway]* - This command allows you to start a giveaway in the channel where the command is typed.
- **/giveawayparticipants** *[giveaway]* - This command allows you to see the list of current participants in the giveaway via the giveaway ID.
- **/giveawayend** *[giveaway]* - This command allows you to immediately conclude the giveaway without waiting for the expiration date, randomly selecting a winner.
helpCommand.welcome_commands: - **/welcome** *[welcome]* - The command allows you to configure the Welcome Message.
